# GitHub Copilot Agents - The Lobbi Figma Demo

Specialized agents for the Lobbi Figma demo project, adapted from agents across the Lobbi ecosystem.

## Agent Inventory

### Design & UI (3 agents)

| Agent | File | Purpose |
|-------|------|---------|
| **UI Design** | `ui-design.agent.md` | Lobbi gold theme, luxury aesthetics, Tailwind v4 + Chakra UI |
| **Design System** | `design-system.agent.md` | Design tokens, anti-AI-slop, style consistency |
| **Animations** | `animations.agent.md` | GSAP + Framer Motion animation patterns |

### Development (4 agents)

| Agent | File | Purpose |
|-------|------|---------|
| **React Components** | `react-components.agent.md` | React 18 + Radix/Chakra/shadcn component development |
| **Charts & Viz** | `charts-visualization.agent.md` | Recharts data visualization and dashboards |
| **Coder** | `coder.agent.md` | TDD implementation, code quality |
| **Debugging** | `debugging.agent.md` | React/Vite/TypeScript troubleshooting |

### Quality & Process (4 agents)

| Agent | File | Purpose |
|-------|------|---------|
| **Testing** | `testing.agent.md` | Vitest + React Testing Library |
| **Reviewer** | `reviewer.agent.md` | Code review, quality scoring |
| **Security** | `security.agent.md` | Vulnerability scanning, secret detection |
| **Documenter** | `documenter.agent.md` | Component docs, README, JSDoc |

### Planning & Research (3 agents)

| Agent | File | Purpose |
|-------|------|---------|
| **Planner** | `planner.agent.md` | Task decomposition, dependency mapping |
| **Analyst** | `analyst.agent.md` | Requirements analysis, risk assessment |
| **Researcher** | `researcher.agent.md` | Technology research, pattern discovery |

## Tech Stack Coverage

All agents are adapted for:
- React 18 + TypeScript 5
- Vite 6 + Tailwind CSS v4
- Chakra UI v3 + Radix UI + shadcn/ui
- GSAP 3.14+ + Framer Motion 12.x
- Recharts 2.x + React DnD 16.x
- Lucide React + Sonner + React Hook Form

## Source Repos

Agents were adapted from:
- `harness-workspace/docs/enhanced-documentation` - UI/Design specialists
- `pro/lobbi-mms-demo` - Orchestration agents (analyst, coder, planner, etc.)
- `dev/lobbi-design-system` - Design system, debugging, testing
